content.text:
# List of national monuments of cultural heritage in Zaporizhzhia Oblast

List of cultural heritage monuments of national significance in Zaporizhzhia Oblast.
Listings
{| class="wikitable"
|-
! No. !! Photo !! Name !! Date !! Location !! Type !! Protected number
|-
| 1 || || Archaeological complex "Ostriv Baida" || 2nd millennium – 10 century BCE, 5th–17th century, 1736–1739 || Zaporizhzhia, Baida Island || monument of archaeology || 080001-N
|-
| 2 || || Grave of Osyp Hladkyi, the Kosh Otaman || 1866 || Zaporizhzhia, vulytsia Zhukovskoho, 55 || monument of history || 080002-N
|-
| 3 || || Memorial complex in honour of Soviet warriors who perished during the Battle of the Dnieper || 1943 || Zaporizhzhia, vulytsia Plotynna || monument of history || 080003-N
|-
| 4 || || House of male gymnasium, in which studied one of leaders of the 1905 Sevastopol armed uprising Pyotr Schmidt || 1876–1880 || Berdiansk, vulytsia P. Shmidta || monument of history || 080004-N
|-
| 5 || || Kurgan burial "Popivski Mohyly" || 4th–3rd millennia BCE, 2nd millennium – 10 century BCE, 4th millennium BCE – 1st half of the 2nd millennium || Berdiansk Raion, village Berestove (outside north-east) || monument of archaeology || 080005-N
|-
| 6 || || Kurgan burial "Kanat-mohyla" || 4th–3rd millennia BCE, 2nd millennium – 10 century BCE, 4th millennium BCE – 1st half of the 2nd millennium || Berdiansk Raion, village Krymka (outside south) || monument of archaeology || 080006-N
|-
| 7 || || Kurgan burial "Tsymbalova mohyla" || 4th–3rd millennia BCE, 2nd millennium – 10 century BCE, 4th millennium BCE – 1st half of the 2nd millennium || Velyka Bilozerka Raion, village Velyka Bilozerka (outside north) || monument of archaeology || 080007-N
|-
| 8 || || Kamianske hillfort || 9th century BCE – 4th century || Kamianka-Dniprovska Raion, Kamianka-Dniprovska || monument of archaeology || 080008-N
|-
| 9 || || Kurgan burial "Mamai-mohyla" || 4th millennium BCE – 1st half of the 2nd millennium || Kamianka-Dniprovska Raion, village Velyka Znamianka (outside north-west) || monument of archaeology || 080009-N
|-
| 10 || || Kurgan burial "Solokha" || 4th millennium BCE – 1st half of the 2nd millennium || Kamianka-Dniprovska Raion, village Velyka Znamianka (outside south) || monument of archaeology || 080010-N
|-
| 11 || || Cult complex "Kamiana Mohyla"|| 22 millennium BCE – 11th century || Melitopol Raion, Myrne (outside east) || monument of archaeology || 080011-N
|-
| 12 || || Kurgan burial "Kuliab mohyla" || 2nd millennium – 10 century BCE, 4th millennium BCE – 1st half of the 2nd millennium || Mykhailivka Raion, village Starobohdanivka (outside west) || monument of archaeology || 080012-N
|}
List of historic and cultural reserves
* National Reserve "Khortytsia"
* State Historic and Archaeological Reserve "Kamiana Mohyla (Stone Grave)"
* Historic and Architectural Reserve "Popov's Manor house"
References
* [http://zakon1.rada.gov.ua/laws/show/928-2009-%D0%BF/page Rada.gov.ua: Objects of cultural heritage of national significance in the State Registry of Immobile monuments of Ukraine] — 2009 Resolution of Cabinet of Ministers of Ukraine.
